page.title: 05ENNERDALE _ Tourism (cont.)
page.content: derived its name because the outcrop of Earth that has been eroded has a red shading that is easily visible from afar.Orienteering and pony treking organisations make good use of the area.It is marvellous walking country in the valley both for the sturdy fell_walker and the less ambitious who are attracted to the Forest Trails and quiet solitude. When in the forest please remember 1.Prevent forest fires. 2.Avoid dropping litter. 3.Keep your dog under control away from sheep. 4.Do nothing to disturb or destroy the wildlife. 5.Do not pollute the water supply.
